entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Whitecourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitecourt Airport 4:23 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Fog. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
